title: Getting Started
contents:
Getting Startedlink

Its super easy to get started with Angular multiselct dropdown

Only three steps required.

  1. Install @ngx-lib/multiselect package

    npm install -g @angular/cli

  2. Import module into your app.module.ts

    import { NgxMultiselectModule } from '@ngx-lib/multiselect'; @NgModule({ imports: [ ..., NgxMultiselectModule // <-- add module in imports ], bootstrap: [AppComponent], providers: [...], declarations: [...] }) export class AppModule { }

  1. Use ngx-multiselect on HTML

    <ngx-multiselect [(ngModel)]="selectedCountry" [options]="countries" ngDefaultControl> </ngx-multiselect> import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({...}) export class SingleSelectComponent implements OnInit { countries; selectedCountry; ngOnInit() { this.countries = [ { id: 1, name: "India"}, { id: 2, name: "USA" }, { id: 3, name: "China" }, { id: 4, name: "Japan" } ]; this.selectedCountry = { id: 1, name: "India" }; } }

Demolink
